text: Mikhail Aleksandrovich Bukin (; born 4 October 1967 in Leningrad) is a former Russian football player and referee. ==Referee career== ;Referee *Russian Second Division: 1999–2005 *Russian First Division: 2001–2005 ;Assistant referee *Russian Second Division: 1998–2000 *Russian First Division: 2000 ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Footballers from Saint Petersburg Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Dynamo Saint Petersburg players Category:FC Dynamo Bryansk players Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Lada Togliatti players Category:FC Kuban Krasnodar players Category:Russian football referees Category:Association football defenders
title: Mikhail Bukin
